name: 韓國學概論（一）
description: 介绍韓國的歷史、地理、政治和社會等各方面的概况。
syllabus:
1st week: Course introduction

2nd week: History(1) – From the mythological period to the Liberation from Japan

3rd week: History(2) – Korean War, the struggle for democracy and the Post-IMF era

4th week: Geography – Functional differentiation of land

5th week: Traditional culture – Classicism or postmodernism?

6th week: Contemporary Korean Language – Traditional language, Multilingualism and so-called ‘internet dialect’

7th week: Subculture – Underground rockers, manga otakus and Youtubers

8th week: University Life – What’s in their mind?

9th week: Mid-term exam

10th week: The social structure of Korea(1)

11th week: The social structure of Korea(2)

12th week: Politics(1) – the rise of the dictatorship and its aftermath

13th week: Politics(2) – the Internet politics and the age of fake news

14th week: Young-feminism after 2016 against patriarchal system

15th week: the continuing cold war on the Korean peninsula

16th week: Culture of sexual minorities

17th week: Civic groups – NGOs and NPOs

18th week: Final exam

methodologies.note: Slideshow presentations including video will be provided
